text: Masikin tukhomin hi chongpêkngei lâia achîntak khom jômloiin, ma angdênin tho sa rangin midangngei khom a minchûn chu invân Rêngrama chu mi chîntak nîng a tih. Nikhomrese tukhomin Balam a jôma, ma angdênin tho sa rangin mi a minchûa anin chu invân Rêngrama chu mi lien nîng a tih.
